author: Special Correspondent
text:
Tamil Nadu Toddy Movement will sell “Neera”, sweet toddy, in Tiruchi on April 16. Neera is the sweet, oyster white-coloured sap tapped from the immature inflorescence of coconut.

S. Nallasamy, Co-ordinator of the Movement, who has been fighting for lifting the ban on extraction and sale of toddy, told presspersons here on Thursday that the agitation would be an eye-opener for the leaders to evolve a policy for lifting the ban on the sale of toddy. – Special Correspondent
title: Toddy movement to sell ‘Neera’
